message:
一个人具有强烈的自我驱动力至关重要！——
这个愿望驱动力可能是改变世界让它变得更好，可能是让人们不再孤独，实现自我价值，为他人带来快乐，也可能是出于对物质或大脑奖励机制反馈的渴望；

但最重要的是你的目标，你的驱动执行力将带领、指引你成为你命中注定该成为的人；
如果不那么做，你可能会抛弃梦想，自我说服成是一个平庸的工具重复过完一生。

Having a strong self-driving force is extremely important for a person!
This desire may be driven by the aim to change the world for the better, alleviate loneliness, achieve self-worth, and bring happiness to others, or it may stem from a longing for feedback from material or brain reward mechanisms.

However, the most crucial aspect is your goal, for your drive and execution will guide you towards becoming the person you are destined to be.
If you do not pursue this, you may abandon your dreams and convince yourself to become a mediocre tool, simply repeating life as it is.

🌟
title: 🌟 一个人具有强烈的自我驱动力至关重要！——
